DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Two Injection Techniques Success Rate Inferior Alveolar Nerve Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study assess efficacy Gow-Gates inferior alveolar nerve block success rate anesthesia patient irreversible pulpitis . In prospective , randomize , double-blind study , forty healthy patient symptomatic irreversible pulpitis include criterion fail infra alveolar nerve block injection ( without lip numbness ) randomly divide two group random basis receive Gow-Gates another inferior alveolar nerve block injection . Their pain evaluate electric pulp tester every 5 minute two time . Endodontic access cavity preparation initiate complete anesthesia . If patient felt pain step caries dentin removal , Endodontic access cavity preparation canal work length determination , treatment stop pain measure Heft Parker 170 mm Visual Analog Scale ( Zero pain 170 maximum pain ) . The patient instructed rate pain mention step . The data analyze Mann-U-Whitney CHI- SQUARE test .
